resourceNotAvailableNotice.title: This dataset is not yet available
resourceNotAvailableNotice.body: This dataset has no distributions. This means that only the description of the dataset is available, while the actual content and data have not yet been published. You can express your interest in the dataset to the responsible organization and request access by clicking the button below. The more people show interest, the greater the chance that the data will be made available.

accessRights.readMoreLinkText: Read more about access levels here

NON_PUBLIC.label: Non-public access
NON_PUBLIC.helpText: Not publicly available due to privacy, security, or other reasons. This category may include resources containing sensitive or personal information.

RESTRICTED.label: Restricted access
RESTRICTED.helpText: Only available under certain conditions. This category may include resources requiring payment, resources shared under confidentiality agreements, or resources where the publisher or owner has not yet decided if they can be made public.

PUBLIC.label: Public access
PUBLIC.helpText: Publicly available to everyone. Access may still require registration and an API key request, as long as anyone can request such registration and/or API keys.

apis.title: APIs providing this dataset
apis.placeholder: No registered APIs provide this dataset.

general.title: General
general.firstHarvestedHelpText: This date indicates when the dataset was harvested by data.norge.no. It may have been available earlier elsewhere.

metadataQuality.title: Metadata Quality
metadataQuality.helpText: Metadata quality is an indicator of how well the datasets are described using metadata.
metadataQuality.helpTextLink: Read more about metadata quality here

content.title: Content
content.conformsToHelpText: Reference to an implementation rule or other specification that forms the basis for the dataset.

notice.title: What is Datalandsbyen?
notice.body: Datalandsbyen is our online forum where you can request data, share experiences, and ask for advice related to data sharing and information management.

rdf.titleHelpText: All URLs to resources on data.norge.no can provide RDF metadata in various formats, depending on the Accept header sent with the request.
rdf.titleHelpTextLink: Read more about RDF and the formats we support here
